directions: Combine edamame, black beans, corn, red onion, red pepper, ginger sesame dressing, and salt in a bowl; stir until well mixed. Place in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
2 tablespoons ginger sesame dressing, or to taste
title: Quick and Easy Edamame Salad
